issues.description: In the problem statement’s description of the client‐side PersonController, it incorrectly says each method takes a Consumer<List<Note>> parameter even though the actual methods (in template and solution) use Consumer<List<Person>>. This mismatch between ‘Note’ and ‘Person’ in the parameter type can confuse students.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement so that it refers to Consumer<List<Person>> (not List<Note>) for the PersonController methods.
